name: Dragon Spawn: Fighter 6 / Bard 4 / Red Dragon Disciple 10
author: KailPendragon

posts.author: KailPendragon
posts.content:
Here we have a strong warrior build combining the fighting prowess of the fighter with RDD "epic" boni and rounded off with bardic skills. It's a pretty solid meleer who can solo with ease. See Dragon Scion for the option to go Bard 2/FTR 8 and get one more combat feat and a handful of HPs at the cost of more frequent skilldumps together with two 1st lvl spells and a slightly more powerful bard song with two additional uses/day. Here I renounced to Expertise, but one has the choice of which combat feat to give up (some might consider dropping called shot eg). Weapon and board is an option for when extra AC is necessary at the cost of -1 AB/-2 dmg. One can choose to go Dex 9, Cha 12 at the start to get access to 2nd lvl spells.

******************************

******************************

Advantages
•Excellent AB
•Good AC
•Versatile fighter with Blind Fight, IC, IKD, Imp. Disarm, PA, Cleave, Called Shot
•Nice HPs
•Good damage output with 30 STR, WS and a 2-hander
•Improved Disarm will grant +4 effective AB vs small weapons, +8 effective AB vs tiny weapons
•UMD
•Taunt
•Minor bardic spellpower/song
•Good Fort save
•Good to decent saves vs spells
•RDD immunitites and breath weapon

Weaknesses
•Could use more skillpoints
•Low will save
•No 2nd lvl spells because of low Cha (reverse Dex and Cha starting scores to fix the issue)

******************************

Feedback and constructive criticism are, as usual, gladly appreciated.

posts.author: KailPendragon
posts.content:
Shahadet wrote:Hey Kail!

Dumb question, but if you were going to take a Dragon Spawn/Dragon Scion upto level 22 on a low magic PW, what would be your preferred build?

Thanks,
a newbie character builder
I'd probably go Bard 3/FTR 7/RDD 10 preepic, then FTR 8 at 21st lvl to grab EWF/EWS and finish it off with Bard 4 for a final skilldump. In a low magic environment the extra +2 AB/+4 dmg is a big bonus.
